textBeforeTable: Parameter Configuration See plugin installation Installation Elchi-AIO patch (optional, automatically detected) VDR >= 1.2.6 Software requirements Hardware requirements This plugin can unmark recording and VDR won't delete them anymore. Also marked recording can be really deleted. When VDR deletes a recording, it is not actually deleted, but marked for later deletion VDR. From time to time, when VDR has nothing else to do, it start to really delete those marked recordings. The undelete plugin restored accidentally deleted recordings.
